original_text: Shaharaim and his wife Hushim had sons called Abitub and Elpaal. In Moab, Shaharaim sent away his two wives, Hushim and Baara. After that, Shaharaim married Hodesh. They had sons called Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam, Jeuz, Sakia and Mirmah. They were leaders of their clans.
korean_text: 또 그의 아내 후심에게서 아비둡과 엘바알을 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: Shaharaim and his wife Hushim had sons
sentences.korean_translation: 사라임과 그의 아내 후심이 아들을 낳았다

sentences.original_text: Shaharaim sent away his two wives
called Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam, Jeuz, Sakia and Mirmah
sentences.korean_translation: 요밥, 시비아, 메사, 말감, 유스, 사키아와 밈마라 불렀다

sentences.original_text: They were leaders of their clans
